Class HomeAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.lunalunera.controller.HomeAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
iHomeController
Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class HomeAdapter extends Object implements iHomeController
Adapter class which implements the method in the interface iHomeController

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handlePlay()
    Method which handle the event of clicking the playButton button by printing a string in the text field only if the boolean validWord is true
    void
    handleWordInTextField()
    Method which uses the Checks class to verify if the string input is a legal one (this is, if it doesn't have blank spaces, if it only has the spanish letters and the legal symbols and if it has eight letters or more)

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public void handleWordInTextField()
      Method which uses the Checks class to verify if the string input is a legal one (this is, if it doesn't have blank spaces, if it only has the spanish letters and the legal symbols and if it has eight letters or more)
